description:
Imports data from a Google Sheets spreadsheet.
Private sheets should be shared with `data-flo@data-flo.iam.gserviceaccount.com`.

input.name: url
input.description:
The URL of the Google Sheets spreadsheet.
Private sheets should be shared with `data-flo@data-flo.iam.gserviceaccount.com`.

input.name: sheetname
input.description:
The title of the Sheet (tab) from which the data will be imported.
If unspecified, the first sheet in the spreadsheet will be imported.

input.name: range
input.description:
A valid range of cells (e.g. 'A1:L512')that contain data.
If unspecified, the whole sheet will be imported.

input.name: skip
input.description:
A list of row numbers to be ignored.
If unspecified, then all rows in the range will be imported.

input.name: cache
input.description: Specifies for how long (in hours) to cache the results. Defaults to `0` (do not cache).

output.name: data
output.description: A datatable containing the imported data.
